components.planningdetails

Class SelectingWaypointState

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.planningdetails.PlanningDetailsState
      • components.planningdetails.SelectingWaypointState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPlanningDetailsState

    public class SelectingWaypointState
extends PlanningDetailsState
    The SelectingWaypointState represents the state of the PlanningDetails when the use clicked on the "add" button to add a new waypoint and we are waiting for him to choose the address (Intersecion) where to add the new Waypoint.

      • refreshView

        public void refreshView()
        In the SelectingWaypointState state, a node is creating for each Planning Waypoint. The "add" and "remove" buttons are disabled for all the spaces and existing waypoints. The space were the waypoint currently be constructed will be added contains a "cancel" button to abort the addition of the waypoint.
        Specified by:
        refreshView in interface IPlanningDetailsState
        Overrides:
        refreshView in class PlanningDetailsState
